LanguageData.GR_ElectroEgg.label: active mechanites
LanguageData.GR_ElectroEgg.description: Because of an active mechanites addiction, this person needs to regularly consume mechanoid eggs, produced by mecha-chickens, to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.GR_Chemical_Featherdust.label: featherdust
LanguageData.GR_Chemical_Featherdust.description: Because of a developed Featherdust dependence, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.GR_Chemical_RoyalJelly.label: royal jelly
LanguageData.GR_Chemical_RoyalJelly.description: Because of a royal jelly addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
